subject: Fwd: Thank you, we are ready to lend you money
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
 
$350,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this simplified form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://tslhqjectrum.com/
